thread.title: GILT PAOF RESULTS: The PAOF for the 4.125% Jul-29 Gilt was not taken up.

author: Moritz Arold
title: GILT PAOF RESULTS: The PAOF for the 4.125% Jul-29 Gilt was not taken up.
text:
December 17, 2024 13:02 GMT
GILT PAOF RESULTS: The PAOF for the 4.125% Jul-29 Gilt was not taken up.
GILT PAOF RESULTS
- GBP937.5mln had been available.
- This leaves GBP37.497bln of the gilt in issue.
